FuncDef:
The cui enable command enables users in a domain to apply to the RADIUS server for the CUI attribute when requesting to get online, and then adds the CUI attribute to the subsequent user accounting packets.
The undo cui enable command cancels the configuration.
By default, this configuration is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After this function is configured for an AAA domain, users in the AAA domain will apply to the RADIUS server for the CUI attribute by sending authentication request packets. The RADIUS server then sends the authentication response packet carrying the CUI attribute to the users.
This command is applicable only when users in a domain adopt RADIUS authentication and RADIUS accounting.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
